# RemoveDevice

**Instance Method**

Removes an audio device from the audio box.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t RemoveDevice(IOUserAudioDevice * in_device);
```

## Parameters

- **in_device**: The [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioDevice] to disassociate from the box.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. For a list of error codes, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Discussion

If removing the device succeeds, the device’s reference count decrements by one.

## Managing Box Contents

- **AddDevice**: Adds an audio device to the audio box.
- **IOUserAudioDevice**: An audio clock device object that handles the configurations for running I/O.
- **AddClockDevice**: Adds an audio clock device to the audio box.
- **RemoveClockDevice**: Adds an audio clock device to the audio box.
- **IOUserAudioClockDevice**: An audio clock device object, used to synchronize and perform I/O.
